author: 80raghavendra
content:
I looked into Merkle drops, whitelists etc. But those appear to orthogonal to what I was looking.

I am kind of surprised that dapps blindly assume a node serving JSON-RPC data. The whole consensus algorithm is built tolerating Byzantine nodes. What if the back-end node is a Byzantine?

What exactly is the reason for not using Merkle proofs? I guess the API get_proof() is already there. Is it because proof sizes and verification times?
